pages.text: You may have some issues getting your ritual to work. This is because rituals require some very specific rules to function.$(br2)So here's a little checklist to go through when your rituals not working.$(br)$(l)Use JEI to make sure you're using the right items and radius.$()

Be sure:$(li)Items are exactly on top of the Center Sigil$(li)You have the exact amount of items on the sigil, no more, no less$(li)The sigil is a perfect circle and has the required radius (use magic chalk)$(li)You are starting the ritual by activating the center sigil with a bare hand
